name: PhoneWave
tag_list: pbx-phone-systems, vertual-fax, home-phone, business-phone, vonage, comwave, viop-toronto, voip-provider, viop-sale, pbx, pbx-toronto, pbx-systems, toronto-viop
overview: PhoneWave is located in Toronto Ontario and is a leading provider of low-cost communications services connecting individuals through broadband devices worldwide. PhoneWave enables small and large size businesses to have a powerful and flexible phone system that connects teams through multiple extensions. It is equipped with advanced call and fax features that match traditional and expensive PBXs used by large corporations. PhoneWave offers the most affordable pricing plans which are all upgradeable, letting you scale your phone system according to your needs. Users are given a rich set of features including VoIP capabilities and exclusive features such as Call Recording, Follow Me and Find Me, Free Long Distance, Call I.D. call forwarding. Other powerful functions include Internet virtual fax $6.95, voicemail with email delivery, customized IVR auto-attendant 19.95, conference bridging $29.95, 1800 toll free number $4.95, All of these features can be set and configured through a single online control center. Home phone VoIP system start at $9.95, Small business phone lines start $14.95. Virtual PBX phone systems are $19.95 a month, free long distance, over 40 free features included. All PBX business phone systems come with No Contracts ever, 100% full money back guaranteed policy. Phone Wave offers up to 90% savings for small or large business using voip, hosted pbx ip pbx, or any phone system. Our Hardware includes Cisco ip phones, polycom soundpoint ip 330 ip670. Use our phone savings calculator.
